extends Object
    Get access to general information about LensKit.
    Since:
    2.1

    • Method Detail

      • getRevisions

        public static Set<String> getRevisions()
        Get the set of revisions LensKit is built from. This is in the order returned by git log, so the head revision is first.
        Returns:
        The set of revisions included in this build of LensKit.

      • includesRevision

        public static boolean includesRevision(String revision)
        Query whether this version of LensKit includes a particular revision.
        Parameters:
        revision - The revision to query.
        Returns:
        true if the LensKit source is descended from revision.

      • getHeadRevision

        public static String getHeadRevision()
        Get the HEAD revision from which LensKit was built.
        Returns:
        The revision from which this version of LensKit was built.

      • lenskitVersion

        public static String lenskitVersion()
        Get the current LensKit version.
        Returns:
        The LensKit version.
